snippet: Posts on Secret, an app that allows users to upload anonymous messages, can range from benign to inappropriate and are testing the tech industry’s appetite for sharing.
abstract: Social app Secret is testing the limits of just how much sharing Silicon Valley thinks is a good thing; sharing is done anonymously and is mostly about the ambitions, disappointments, rivalries, jealousies and obsessions of the engineers and entrepreneurs who live and work there.
lead_paragraph: Posts on Secret, an app that allows users to upload anonymous messages, can range from benign to inappropriate and are testing the tech industry’s appetite for sharing.

headline.main: New Social App Has Juicy Posts, All Anonymous
headline.print_headline: New Social App Has Juicy Posts, All Anonymous
